title: Full-Stack Software Developer

sections.full_text:
Full-Stack Software Developer
NexaTech Solutions Calgary, AB

Responsibilities:
- Build and maintain REST APIs using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL
- Develop responsive React front-end components
- Write automated tests and participate in code reviews
- Collaborate with designers and product managers
sections.skills:
- JavaScript, TypeScript, React
- Node.js, Express, SQL
- Git, Docker, CI/CD

full_text_snippet:
Full-Stack Software Developer 
NexaTech Solutions Calgary, AB

Responsibilities:
- Build and maintain REST APIs using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL
- Develop responsive React front-end components
- Write automated tests and participate in code reviews
- Collaborate with designers and product managers

Required Skills:
- JavaScript, TypeScript, React
- Node.js, Express, SQL
- Git, Docker, CI/CD

Preferred:
- Experience with AWS or GCP
- Familiarity with microservices architecture
